Name: market for hard coal briquettes | hard coal briquettes | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21031/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'hard coal briquettes', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;hard coal briquettes' is a fossil fuel with a calorific value of 31.4 MJ/kg. It is used as a solid fuel and is produced by brick making from hard coal using bitumen as binder. Its main applications are in the following sectors: domestic and industrial power source. 1 MJ equals 0.0318 kg of hard coal.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'hard coal briquettes',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'hard coal briquettes',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
